column2: "Thank you, senpai. My request was unreasonable, but you listened to me anyway."

"Thanks to you, I learned a lot. Every move you made was full of meaning...
Amazing."
"...I don't have the words to describe how amazing it was. It was really, really amazing."
"I don't think I'll ever be your equal, but I'll do my best to get as close as I can."
